articles.title: Police issue update after man, 33, found dead on street
articles.description: A cordon was in place at the scene
articles.content:
Police have issued an update after a 33-year-old man was found dead in Stockport over the weekend. Officers were called out to Branfield Avenue, in Heald Green, at around 1.20pm on Sunday (February 16).

articles.description: The Philippine Army said Monday it will acquire short-range air defense systems to project its force in the country's territory, according to its chief, Lieutenant General Roy Galido.
